Citations

Custom Fonts by Google Fonts (https://fonts.google.com/)

Favicon by favicon.io (https://favicon.io/)

Icons by Font Awesome (https://fontawesome.com/)

Smooth scroll by Karl Swedberg (https://github.com/kswedberg/jquery-smooth-scroll)

Main Header hero background image taken by Jono & Laynie (https://www.jonoandlaynie.com/) from mine and my husband's Engagement Photoshoot :)

Code for dynamic "Jacqui" on hover in Main Header from Wes Bos' JavaScript30 (https://javascript30.com/)

Typed.js by Matt Boldt (https://github.com/mattboldt/typed.js/)

Headshot by Fatima Gueye (https://www.linkedin.com/in/fatima-gueye-36397457/?originalSubdomain=ca)

Animate On Scroll Library by Michał Sajnóg (https://michalsnik.github.io/aos/)

Particles.js by Vincent Garreau (https://vincentgarreau.com/particles.js/)

jQuery by jQuery (https://jquery.com/)

Sass by Sass (https://sass-lang.com/)
